dcterms:creator: Sapna Negi
Tobias Daudert
Paul Buitelaar
dcterms:description: A dataset for subtask A that includes 8,500 examples, with 6,415 labeled as non-suggestions and 2,085 labeled as suggestions. It includes a trial dataset with 592 examples, divided into 296 examples for each class, focusing on software suggestion forum posts.
dcterms:title: Subtask A Dataset

dcterms:creator: Henning Wachsmuth
Martin Trenkmann
Benno Stein
Gregor Engels
Tsvetomira Palakarska
dcterms:description: A dataset for subtask B that contains 808 examples, with 404 examples for each class, used for cross-domain classification of hotel reviews.
dcterms:title: Subtask B Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sapna Negi
Maarten de Rijke
Paul Buitelaar
dcterms:description: A dataset used for cross-domain classification, specifically for the domain of hotel reviews, which is referenced for additional data in the context of subtask B.
dcterms:title: Hotel Review Dataset
